entry.title: common-lisp-variables
entry.content:
变量基础

Common Lisp 是动态类型的语言——动态检测类型错误, 另一方面，Common Lisp是一种强类型语言——没有办法将对象视为不是它的类的实例, Common Lisp 中的所有值至少在概念上都是对对象的引用 —— practical common lisp

变量的声明:

(let ("变量")  "作用域")

entry.title: 猜词游戏
entry.content:
在家没事，写了个小游戏

"""猜数词游戏-1.0author: HomesIII字典目录[dictionary_path]字典格式:    word explain(中文等双字节字符)    word explain(中文等双字节字符)    ...  ..."""import refrom time import sleepfrom sys import exit as s_exitfrom random import randinterrors = 0# 用字典目录替换这个dictionary_path = '[dictionary_path]'def choose_word():    wd = ''    global errors # 统计错误，防止递归过深    line_counter = 0 #行数    counter = 0 #目标词所在行，用random.randint生成    try:        with open(dictionary_path, 'r') as f:            for _ in f:                line_counter += 1            line = randint(1, line_counter)        with open(dictionary_path, 'r') as file:            for w in file:                counter += 1                if counter == line:                    wd = w.strip()    except FileNotFoundError:        print('无法打开指定的文件!')    except LookupError:        print('指定了未知的编码!')    except UnicodeDecodeError:        print('读取文件时解码错误!')    except IOError:        print('读写文件时出现错误.')    try:        words = re.search(r'(\w*\s?\w*)(?=\s)', wd).group(0)        explains = re.search(r'(?<=\s)[^\x00-\xff]+', wd).group(0)        # 判断wd是否为空，若为空则递归调用choose_word        # 若字典格式错误，words, explains 为空也会报错        return words, explains    except AttributeError:        errors += 1        if errors == 10:            print('文件错误过多, 已停止递归')            s_exit()        print(f'第{line}行: :{wd}: 格式错误')        print("正确格式: 单词 解释")        return choose_word()print("这是一个回合制猜词游戏.按.h显示帮助")i = input("回车开始")round_ = 0 #回合数tip_rule = 0 # 提示频率(猜几次提示一次)auto_play = Falsesleep_time = 1while not i:    word, explain = choose_word()#选词    round_ += 1    print()    print(f'-------第{round_}回合--------')    display_num = 1 # 展示的字母数量    time = 0 # 猜的次数, 可以设置提示频率    while not (ipt := input(f"这个单词以{word[:display_num]}开头: ")) or ipt[:2] != '.q':        time += 1        if ipt == '.h':            time -= 1 #每次使用特殊命令, 猜的次数减一(特殊命令不计入猜测次数)            print()            print('------帮助-------')            print('.h   ---帮助')            print('.q   ---退出')            print('.t   ---提示')            print('.l   ---提示单词长度')            print('.g   ---放弃')            print('.s   ---设置')            print('         |_学习模式自动进入下一个')            print('         |_自动学习模式间隔时间')            print('         |_自动提示频率')            print()            print('.k   ---学习')            print()        elif ipt == word:            print('猜对啦')            print(word + ', '+explain)            break        elif ipt == '.t':            time -= 1            display_num += 1            if display_num == len(word):                print('这个单词是' + word + '!')                print('解析: ' + explain)                break            continue        elif ipt == '.l':            time -= 1            print(f'这个单词有{len(word)}个字母')        elif ipt == '.s':            time -= 1            print()            print(f'1 ---学习模式自动进入下一个({str(auto_play)})')            print(f'2 ---自动学习模式间隔时间({sleep_time}秒)')            print(f'3 ---提示频率({tip_rule})')            print()            choose = input('选择设置项(1/2/3): ')            if choose == '1':                auto_play = not auto_play # 旧版实现: input('学习模式自动进入下一个[(y)/n]') != 'n'                print('设置成功, 间隔时间:', sleep_time, '秒')            elif choose == '2':                conti = True                while conti:                    try:                        user_sleep = input('自动学习模式间隔时间(秒): ')                        if not user_sleep:                            print('已取消')                            break                        sleep_time = float(user_sleep)                        conti = False                        print('设置成功, 间隔时间:', sleep_time, '秒')                    except Exception:                        print('请输入数字')            elif choose == '3':                tip = tip_rule                while tip == tip_rule:                    rule = input('设置提示频率(默认不自动提示): ') if tip_rule == 0 else input(f'设置提示频率(猜{tip_rule}次提示一次): ')                    if not rule:                        print("已取消")                        break                    try:                        int(rule)                    except Exception:                        print('请输入数字, 回车取消')                        continue                    tip_rule = int(rule)                    print("设置成功")                    break # break是为了避免用户重复设置同一值的时候进入死循环一直提示输入(虽然回车可以取消)            else:                print('取消.')        elif ipt == '.g':            print(f'加油⛽, 这个单词是{word}, ' + explain)            break        elif ipt == '.k':            print('-----学习模式-----')            input('回车键继续')            try:                with open(dictionary_path, 'r') as reader:                    for lines in reader:                        print(lines, end = '')                        if auto_play:                            sleep(sleep_time)                            continue                        input()                    print()                                    except Exception as e:                print('文件读写错误')                print('异常信息: \n', e)        else:            print('猜错了')        if tip_rule != 0 and time != 0 and time % tip_rule == 0:            print()            display_num += 1            if display_num == len(word):                print('这个单词是' + word + '!\n解析: explain')                break # 提示单词加一后立即判断是否猜出, 若未猜出，再输出提示            print(f"提示:\n这个单词以{word[:display_num]}开头")    else:        s_exit() if input('退出?[(y)/n]') in 'Yy\n' else Noneelse:    print("退出......")    s_exit()

紧跟着的是文章标题.

先整体抓取<ol>中的部分:

然后抓取名称和链接:

chapter_links = re.findall("href='(.*?)'", urls, re.S)chapter_names = re.findall("'>(.*?)</a", urls, re.S)

搞完以后，把它们下载下来

from os import makedirsimport requestsmakedirs("commonlisp", exist_ok = True)for name, link in zip(chapter_names, chapter_links):    print("downloading " + name + "...")    with open("commonlisp/" + link, "w") as file:        file.write(requests.get(url + link).text)print("done.")

这个爬虫程序可以说是非常简单，因为它只有源代码爬取功能，没有做数据清洗，所以不是给人看的，而且因为是单线程，速度方面不够优秀，不过范例章节比较少，也算是差强人意
